subject: creating more assertX methods
msgSnippet: Hi all, I ve been using assertEquals (Junit v3.5) in many tests and it works well.  I ve been thinking that it might be handy to have assertGreater() and
messageBody:
Hi all,
 
    I've been using assertEquals (Junit v3.5) in many tests and it works well.  I've been thinking that it might be handy to have assertGreater() and assertGreaterOrEqual() methods as well.  My first impulse is to subclass Assert and put them there.  Is there another (better) way to do this? Any ideas would be appreciated.  If anyone has done this before and would like to send me their code, that would be appreciated too ;)
 
    - Matt
      matt@...
